places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Bliss
address: Lazibal, KP Rd, Sadiq Abad, Anantnag, 192101

reviews.text: It was expensive. Staff behaviour wasn't welcoming. The hearing system wasn't working properly. Issues with the Hotel water. Overall the service wasn't good at all.

We booked  13 August 2023 two rooms in this hotel bliss very very experience with in half a hour called staff to fix both rooms toilets also one room ac stoped call again to fix staff had attitude big time than decided few family members went to our relatives home. Next morning trying to take shower same thing happened in the middle water stopped coming through tap. Wifi was working whole time. Even I talked their manager explain everything about last night and morning. I won’t go there again. Don’t give these kind people any business they don’t deserve. Big no thumb down to their service. Before booking think about going to have good time worse experience shame on them
Good food. Good location and nice service

Ever worst service as well as hotel management. No one at Reception from 10pm to 9am.
No towel soap in washroom,
No complimentary water available.
Forgot to take top roof view, it’s good place for staying cause got super supported warm shower water n it’s located on the road side. Recommend

places_with_reviews.name: Pinez Guest House - Best Hotel in Anantnag

reviews.text:
Best and trusted hotel for family and bachelor’s in anantnag
Rooms are neat and clean.
Heater blankets and room heater are there which is very helpful during winter times.
Receptionist and Manager were very friendly.
Superb stay. Neat and clean rooms . Very polite staff.

Located in a silent area,rooms are spacious  enough with clean bed having excellent ventilation with fan and tv.Bath room cleanliness can be improved though accessories are comfortable with working geyser and I paid 1000 rupees for single occupancy and choice is limited in Anantnag.
I want to know,is this a couple friendly hotel like can we stay here with girlfriend

This is a good option to stay overnight if you are travelling or are in a vacation. Not recommended for a long 2-3 or more days of stay as there are other better options, however for a overnight stay it is perfect!

Recommend to visit.
Also at good location
You have plenty of options for shopping and food. Parking is available
